characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: A new lawyer at the agency. She's been arrested as the suspect in the case.
characters.description2: A lawyer who works under me. She is currently the main suspect in her mother's murder, which took place seven years ago.

characters.name: Apollo Justice
characters.description1: Currently working on his own. He says he wants to bring his friend's killer to justice, but I wonder if that's all.
characters.description2: An ardent young lawyer at my agency. His voice can get really loud at times.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: My daughter, who also happens to be an aspiring magician. I adopted her eight years ago.

characters.name: Clay Terran
characters.description1: The victim in this case. He was a HAT-2 crew member and a close friend of Apollo's.

characters.name: Juniper Woods
characters.description1: Athena's childhood friend. I defended her when she was on trial for the courtroom bombing incident.

characters.name: Solomon Starbuck
characters.description1: The defendant in this case.[1] He was a HAT-2 crew member and a mentor to the victim.

characters.name: Simon Blackquill
characters.description1: Convicted of the murder at the Space Center seven years ago. He's chasing a phantom he saw back then.
characters.description2: A prosecutor who can get into people's heads. He was proven innocent after the false charges against him were exposed.

characters.name: Bobby Fulbright
characters.description1: The detective assigned to this case. He led the evacuation effort at the Space Center after the bombing incident.
characters.description2: He may very well be the spy behind the murders and bombings, both past and present.

characters.name: Candice Arme
characters.description1: A detective who specialized in bomb cases. Was on detail at the Space Center. One of the first to find the body.

characters.name: Yuri Cosmos
characters.description1: The director of the Space Center and one of the first people to discover the body. He seems exceedingly full of himself.

characters.name: Ponco
characters.description1: A guide robot at the Space Center. She can provide information on the Center and show people around.
characters.description2: A guide robot at the Space Center. She witnessed the murder seven years ago.

characters.name: Aura Blackquill
characters.description1: A researcher who's developing robots at the Space Center. She is Prosecutor Blackquill's older sister.

characters.name: Clonco
characters.description1: One of the robots developed by Aura, who refers to him as "Hunk of Junk".

characters.name: Metis Cykes
characters.description1: Athena's mother and victim of the murder seven years ago. She was a talented psychologist like her daughter.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: A spirit medium in training. Her psychic powers are beyond question.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: The chief prosecutor. He's an old friend and a former prosecutor against whom I fought many courtroom battles.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. Proof of my profession.

evidences.name: Space Center Diagram
evidences.description1: A cross-section view of the main building of the Space Center and Launch Pad 1.

evidences.name: Utility Knife
evidences.description1: It has the victim's blood on it. From a set of utility tools used by Space Center techs.
evidences.description2: The murder weapon in this case. Athena also used one of these to stab the phantom's hand during the incident seven years ago.

evidences.name: Space Center Pamphlet
evidences.description1: It includes a diagram of the boarding lounge and a cross-section view of the Space Center. (3 pages.)

evidences.name: "Hope" Capsule
evidences.description1: Found in the victim's possession. It recently returned from a seven-year mission and contains asteroid samples.
evidences.description2: It was at the crime scene seven years ago. It was launched into space and only returned to Earth a few days ago.

evidences.name: HAT-1 Exhibit
evidences.description1: A newspaper clipping, a photo of the people involved with the launch, and a jacket one of them wore.
evidences.description2: A newspaper clipping, a photo of the people involved with the launch, and the jacket worn by Dr. Cykes.

evidences.name: Katana
evidences.description1: The weapon used in the murder seven years ago. It belonged to the victim. The victim's blood was found only on the blade.

evidences.name: Seven-Year-Old Video
evidences.description1: Video showing the corridor to the crime scene. Blackquill was the only one to pass through at the time of the crime.

evidences.name: Photo of the Crime
evidences.description1: Taken inadvertently. It became conclusive evidence at Simon Blackquill's trial seven years ago.
evidences.description2: The photo shows Blackquill taking the robot apart. There's a bloodstain at the end of the robot's arm.

evidences.name: Seven-Year-Old Photos
evidences.description1: Two photos of the body and crime scene. They were taken by the first person to discover the body.

evidences.name: Metis's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: The cause of death was a stab wound to the chest. The weapon pierced the heart and so death was instantaneous.

evidences.name: Robots with a Heart
evidences.description1: It explains the recognition and communication features of the Ponco series of Robots.

evidences.name: Moon Rock Earring
evidences.description1: An earring that Dr. Cykes gave to Athena. The stone was cut from a real moon rock that was being used for research.

evidences.name: Phantom's Psych Profile
evidences.description1: The subject's emotions rarely fluctuate and he doesn't experience feelings like normal people do.

evidences.name: Terran's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Cause of death: Stabbing. The victim was discovered in the third-floor boarding lounge in the main building.

evidences.name: Security Camera Video
evidences.description1: Video showing the defendant and victim's escape from the corridor. The video ends immediately after this scene.

evidences.name: Launch Pad 1 Door Lock
evidences.description1: Starbuck's prints were found on this door lock. Also see photo taken after the incident. (2 pages.)
evidences.description2: The biometric door lock. Print authentication isn't required from the launch pad side. (2 pages.)

evidences.name: Aura's Statement
evidences.description1: The perp held a lighter with an Earth emblem on it in their left hand, and a knife in their right.

evidences.name: Lighter
evidences.description1: Evidence found by Detective Fulbright. It has Athena's prints on it in the victim's blood.
evidences.description2: A lighter that can transform into a handgun. It has Clay Terran's fingerprints and blood on it.

evidences.name: Emergency Ladder
evidences.description1: It was lowered to the ground from the window of the fourth-floor robotics lab. It was used to evacuate Space Center personnel.

evidences.name: Phony Phanty Bomb
evidences.description1: It was found in Boarding Lounge 1 and detonated in Courtroom No. 4. Fragments are being analyzed. (2 pages.)
